about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an epic yet whimsical journey to defend the crystals from hordes of enemies, each more broken-down than the next, with a whole arsenal of tricks!

  • Fast-paced defense battles that will keep you entertained for hours!
  • Beautiful 3D cartoon graphics!
  • 12 towers and constructions with 2 levels of unlockable improvements to adapt your strategy, including cannons, ballistae, guard towers.
  • Collect crystals to unlock towers, buildings or improvements.
  • More than 20 different crazy enemies, from slime to orc, carnivorous plant or specter, with their variants.
  • Intense boss fights that will put pressure on you!
  • Dig to discover resources but a whole bunch of other surprises.
  • References and winks galore!
